title: As a user I want to be able to quickly download all of the attachments on a form
custom_preconds: GIVEN a Club user logs in with view or edit permissions
custom_steps: WHEN user is viewing MJC, UEC or any transactions with attached files section
custom_expected:
THEN The "Attached Files" section in View mode displays per the provided wireframe.
AND The user has the ability to quickly select All using the top level checkbox.
AND The user should still have the ability to download a single file by clicking on the file name.
AND Selecting more than one file will enable the download icon.
AND Clicking the download icon will zip the files and download the zipped file to the user's computer.

title: As a user I want to be able to email the attachments on a form
custom_preconds: GIVEN a Club user logs in with view or edit permissions
custom_steps: WHEN user is viewing MJC, UEC or any transactions with attached files section
custom_expected:
THEN There is no longer an envelope icon available on the global Attached Files section in view mode.
AND The "Attached Files" section in View mode displays per the provided wireframe.
AND The user has the ability to quickly select All using the top level checkbox.
AND Selecting one or more file will enable the email icon.
AND Clicking the email icon will launch a new email window for the user using their default email. 
AND If more than 1 file was selected:
  - zip the files
  - include all the labels in the subject
  - use the first and last name as the zip filename
OR If only 1 file was selected: 
 - just attach the single file to the email
 - include the Last, First of the player the form is for followed by the attachment's label

Wireframe:
https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=bulk_download_attachments
https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=email_an_attachment

title: As a Club user I want to view the System Forms widget
custom_preconds: GIVEN Club user logs in with system forms widget permission
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on "Blank Forms" tab on the "Reporting" dashboard
custom_expected:
THEN system should load the System Forms widget. 
AND The widget should follow the provided data discovery and wireframe.
AND Clubs will never be able to edit this widget.

Wireframe:
https://7xflwf.axshare.com/#p=forms

Data Discovery: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Data+Discovery+-+System+Forms+widget

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to create an Investigation for an International Amateur player
custom_preconds: GIVEN BOC user logs in with edit permission for Investigations
custom_steps: WHEN user opens International Amateur profiles
custom_expected:
THEN Users with Edit permissions for Investigations see a Create New icon on International Amateur profiles.
AND BOC users are able to launch a new Investigation for the player via the Create New. 
AND The Investigation workflow is able to be completed for the new kind of International Amateur profiles, just like it was previously. 
AND Creating and saving an investigation in ebis should send all relevant player information to LARI AID, along with the created Investigation. 
( See stories #139253905 and #140608327)
AND This needs to still work for existing international amateurs.

title: As a user I want to be able to create an Employee Contract for an International Amateur player
custom_preconds: GIVEN BOC and Club user logs in with UEC and International Amateur profile permission
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on Create New icon on International Amateur profile
custom_expected:
THEN Users are able to launch a new Employee Contract for the player via the Create New. 
AND The Employee Contract should work for the new version of international amateurs just as it does for the old version, including the conversion of the International Amateur profile to an Employee profile.

title: As a BOC user I want to be able to delete a registration player profile
custom_preconds:
GIVEN BOC logs in with Registration player profile delete permissions
AND User has navigated to the International Dashboard
custom_steps: WHEN user opens a registered profile in edit or view mode
custom_expected:
THEN There is a "delete" button when viewing a registration player profile in edit mode or view mode.
AND Clicking "Delete" prompts the user to confirm they wish to delete the profile. See Messages #10
AND Confirming on that message will prompt the user to be extra sure. See Messages # 11.
AND If the user confirms both messages, the player is deleted from the system. They should no longer appear on any widgets or in any searches.

Messages: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Messages+-+International+Amateur

title: As a Club user I want to see an Are you Sure message if I attempt to override a match message
custom_preconds:
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Messages+-+International+Amateur

GIVEN a user is attempting to register a new international registration profile
AND the user has entered data in the create new fields that triggers a 4 of 7 match
AND user has clicked "Register"
AND matching modal has a "Register" button available
AND matching modal has a "Register MLSB entered" or "Add to Club Reg List" options (where applicable)
custom_steps: WHEN Club user clicks "Register" on the matching message
custom_expected:
THEN the system should ask if the user is sure that they wish to create the profile anyway
AND Messages #30: "Matches were found to this player. Please make sure that you have reviewed the matches and the profile does not yet exist in the system prior to continuing." 
AND if user clicks "Ignore and Continue" system should continue with registering the profile
BUT if user clicks "Back" system should cancel the registration and take user back to entry point

title: As a user I want matching messages to default to NOT creating a new profile unless that is the only way forward
custom_preconds:
GIVEN Club and BOC user logs in with International Amateur registration permission
AND user tries to register a player with the information that match the existing international player profile on the system
custom_steps: WHEN user user clicks on 'Register' on the Create New
custom_expected:
THEN user is presented with a matching message from the Create New widget, the system should default the selection on the matching message to that which already exists in the system, unless there are no other actions that can be taken. 
 - Example: If a user is attempting to register a player and the system finds a match to another player not yet on their Club Reg List, the matching message displayed should have the first "System matches" match found selected, and the "Add to Club Reg List" button activated by default. 
AND The user should have the ability to select the new information and proceed with Registration anyway, assuming that they otherwise would have been able to (no rules/system dates stopping them).

title: As a Club user I want to be able to upload a spreadsheet of players to add to my Club Reg List
custom_preconds: GIVEN a Club user logs in with international player edit permissions
custom_steps: WHEN user clicks on "Spreadsheet Upload" on the Club Reg List widget
custom_expected:
THEN system will launch the provided modal.
AND the modal will allow the user to browse and select a file for upload.
AND Once a file has been selected, the "Upload" button becomes enabled. 
AND Clicking "Upload" will process the attached spreadsheet, and display a success message detailing the number of players (rows) included in the spreadsheet, and instructing the user to review their notifications widget for results. (See wire). 

*Error handling and actual processing of the players and results handled in follow up stories*

Wireframe: 
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=spreadsheet_upload

title: As a Club user I want players contained in my spreadsheet that were not yet added to my Club Reg List to be added
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in with Admin permissions for Registration Profile
AND user is navigate to the spreadsheet upload modal
AND user uploaded the spreadsheet
custom_steps: WHEN the spreadsheet is able to pass the initial required field and format check
custom_expected:
THEN the system will process each of the rows contained in the spreadsheet. 
AND The system will take the information entered in each field, and run a "registration check" according to the standard matching rules to determine if the player already exists in the system as a registered player. 
AND If the player is found to be registered, and the player is not yet on the uploading Org's Club Registration List, then the system will automatically add the player to the uploading Org's Club Reg List. 
OR If more than one matching registration profile is found, all are added to their Club Reg List.
OR If the player is found to be a grandfathered player, no action is taken.
OR If the player is not found in the system, no action is taken.

Wireframe: 
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=spreadsheet_upload

Template: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Spreadsheet+Upload+%28Registration%29-+Data+Discovery

title: As a Club user I want to be able to download the results of my spreadsheet upload
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in with Admin permissions for Registration Profile
AND user is navigate to the spreadsheet upload modal 
AND user uploaded the spreadsheet
custom_steps: WHEN the spreadsheet is able to pass the initial required field and format check
custom_expected:
THEN the system will process each of the rows contained in the spreadsheet. 
AND The system will take the uploaded spreadsheet, add a "Results column" to the end of the spreadsheet, and populate the results for each row contained in the spreadsheet that is processed. 
AND If the player on a row is found in the system and is Registered, the Results column will say Registered.
OR If the player on a row is found in the system and is not Registered, or the uploading Org does not have permission to see the match if it were to be created via the Create New, the Results column will say Not Registered.
OR If the player on a row is NOT found in the system, the Results column will say Not Registered. 
OR If the player entered for a row is not subject to registration based on the DOB entered, the Results column will say Grandfathered. 
AND Once the system has finished constructing this results spreadsheet, it should appear in the Notifications widget of the uploading Club for the uploading user. The Description should read "Club Registration Spreadsheet Upload Results". 
* Clicking on the description of the notification will download the results spreadsheet to the user's computer.

Wireframe: 
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=spreadsheet_upload

Template: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Spreadsheet+Upload+%28Registration%29-+Data+Discovery

title: As a Club user I want to see an error if I have attempted to check the registration status of too many players
custom_preconds:
GIVEN a user is logged in with Admin permissions for Registration Profile
AND user is navigate to the spreadsheet upload modal
custom_steps: WHEN user clicking "Upload" on the spreadsheet upload modal
custom_expected:
THEN system will check to see how many players the uploading Org has already checked the registration status of for the current registration period via spreadsheet upload. (do NOT include registration checks done via the create new)
AND If the number they have already checked + the number of populated rows on the uploaded spreadsheet exceeds the limit set by the BOC, display an error. See Messages #29. 
AND The limit set by the BOC is currently 1,500 and is a value on the system values screen.

Wireframe: 
https://tb5api.axshare.com/#p=spreadsheet_upload

Messages: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/Messages+-+International+Amateur

title: As a Club user I only want to see international amateur players in Advanced Search that I have permission to see
custom_preconds:
Visibility Rules: 
https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/EBIS/International+Amateur+-+Profile+Visibility
GIVEN a club user with edit/view permissions for International Amateur player profiles is logged in
custom_steps: WHEN Club user is using advanced search to find an International Amateur player profile
custom_expected:
THEN only players that the user has permission to see should appear as results
AND what players user has permission to see should be based on attached rules from wiki
BUT BOC users should continue to see all players

title: International Player Profile Permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with either editors or viewers permission AND the new International LDAP role
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to do anything with an international amateur profile
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to see and use the following: 
 - International Amateurs2 Quick Search
 - International Amateurs2 Advanced Search
 - Load the new International Amateur profiles
AND users with edit permissions see the "New Player" tab under International
BUT users without international amateur edit permissions should not see this tab
AND users with edit permissions should be able to create new, save new and edit/save existing international amateur profiles (both registration and grandfathered)
AND both of these roles are granted to both BOC and Club users. 
AND BOC Users with L2 Editors permission should be able to edit the L2 Possibility checkbox 
BUT BOC users without this permission should be unable to edit this checkbox
AND users outside the BOC should continue to not see the checkbox at all
AND BOC users with the deleters permission should see the Delete button on international amateur profiles (where applicable)
BUT users without this permission should not see this button

Existing LDAPs:
EBIS-INTL-PLAYER-EDITORS 
EBIS-INTL-PLAYER-VIEWERS
EBIS-INTL-L2-EDITORS
EBIS-INTL-PLAYER-DELETERS

title: Club Registration List permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN a club user is logged in with permission to view the widget AND the new international
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to view the Club Registration List widget
custom_expected:
THEN Club should see the "International" dashboard, and see the "L1 Reg" tab. 
AND Loading the L1 Reg tab as a Club displays the Club Registration List widget at the top. 
BUT Club users without this permission do not see the International dashboard at all. 
AND users with player edit permissions see the "Upload Spreadsheet" button on the widget (and can use it). 
BUT users without international amateur profile edit permissions do not see this button. 
AND BOC Users with permission to view the widget AND the new international permission see the Club Registration List widget at the bottom of their L1 Reg tab.
AND The "Upload Spreadsheet" button should never appear for BOC. 

Existing LDAPs:
EBIS-WIDGET-CLUB-REGISTRATION-LIST-VIEWERS
EBIS-INTL-PLAYER-EDITORS

title: Registration Admin Permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with either the Registration Admin viewers permission AND the new International LDAP role
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to view Registration Admin
custom_expected:
THEN BOC user are able to see the Registration Admin widget. 
AND If a BOC user has permission to view this widget, then they should see the "International" dashboard, and the "L1 Reg" tab.
BUT BOC Users without this widget will not see the International dashboard. 
AND Users with the "all Orgs Viewer" permission can see the additional registering Orgs column. 
BUT Users without this permission cannot see this column. 
AND Users with merge permissions see the "Merge" button on the widget (and can use it). 
BUT Users without merge permissions do not see this button. 
AND Users with the L2 Editors permissions see the "L2 Possibility" button on the widget (and can use it). 
BUT Users without the L2 editors permissions do not see this button.  

Existing LDAPs:
EBIS-INTL-L2-EDITORS
EBIS-INTL-PLAYER-ALL-ORGS-VIEWERS
EBIS-INTL-PLAYER-DELETERS
EBIS-INTL-PLAYER-MERGERS
EBIS-WIDGET-REGISTRATION-ADMIN-VIEWERS

title: Level 2 widget permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with permission to view the widget AND the new international permission
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts view the Level 2 widget
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to see the "L2 Reg" tab. 
AND Loading the L2 Reg tab as a Club displays the Level 2 Registration widget on the top.  
AND Club users without this permission do not see the L2 at all. 
AND Club users with the L2 Requesters permission see the "Request" buttons on the widget (and can use them). 
BUT Users without L2 Requesters permissions do not see these buttons. 
AND BOC Users with permission to view the widget AND the new international permission should see the Level 2 Registration List widget beneath the L2 Possibilities widget on their L2 Reg.
AND The "Request" buttons should never appear for BOC. 

Existing LDAPs:
EBIS-INTL-L2-REQUESTERS
EBIS-WIDGET-L2-REGISTRATION-VIEWERS

title: Level 2 Possibilities permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with permission to view the widget AND the new international permission
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to view the Level 2 Possibilities widget
custom_expected:
THEN BOC users should see the Level 2 Possibilities widget at the top of their L2 Reg tab.
BUT The L2 Reg tab is not displayed for BOC users without this LDAP. 
AND All of the action buttons on this widget should be controlled by the L2 Editors permission. 
BUT Users without this role are not able to take any actions on this widget.  

New LDAPs:


Existing LDAPs:
I don't think a widget LDAP exists for this already? 
EBIS-INTL-L2-EDITORS

title: L2 Requests widgets Permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with Investigation Request widget viewers permissions AND the new International LDAP role
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to view L2 Requests widgets
custom_expected:
THEN BOC Users who have the permissions should be able to see the Investigation Inquiries widget. 
AND BOC Users who have the Drug Test Request widget viewers permissions AND the new International LDAP role are able to see the Drug Test Inquiries widget. 
AND If a BOC user has permission to view this widget, then they should see the "L2 Inquiries" tab. 
BUT BOC Users without either of these widget permissions will not see this tab. 
AND Users who can see these widgets are able to use them. 
AND Users who have these permissions are also able to edit/use the corresponding sections in the Email Utility.  

Existing LDAPs:
EBIS-WIDGET-INVESTIGATION-INQUIRIES-EDITORS
EBIS-WIDGET-DRUG-TEST-INQUIRIES-EDITORS

title: Trainer Agent permissions
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is logged in with either the profile editors or profile viewers permission AND the new International LDAP role
custom_steps: WHEN user attempts to do anything with Trainer/Agent profiles
custom_expected:
THEN user should be able to see and use the following: 
 - International Trainer2 Advanced Search
 - Load the new trainer/agent profiles
AND Users with edit permissions see the "Create New" button on the trainer/agent widget (and can use it). 
BUT Users without trainer/agent edit permissions do not see this button. 
AND Users with edit permissions are able to create new, save new and edit/save existing trainer/agent profiles. 
AND Users with merge permissions see the "Merge" button on the trainer/agent widget (and can use it). 
BUT Users without trainer/agent merge permissions do not see this button. 
AND Users with delete permissions see the "Delete" button on the trainer/agent profile (and can use it). 
BUT Users without trainer/agent delete permissions do not see this button. 
AND Merge and Delete will only be assigned to BOC. View/edit/ view widget will be assigned to BOC and MLSB.  

New LDAP: 
EBIS-INTL-TRAINER-AGENT-MERGERS

Existing LDAPs:
EBIS-INTL-TRAINER-AGENT-VIEWERS
EBIS-INTL-TRAINER-AGENT-EDITORS
EBIS-INTL-TRAINER-AGENT-DELETERS
EBIS-WIDGET-TRAINER-AGENT-VIEWERS
